title: Love Watch Face for Wear
summary: ♥ Customize your Watch Face with your LOVE name and other configurations ♥
description: This watch face is for Android Wear smart watches.♥ Custom text♥ Date (day + month)♥ The fill heart from the heart ring represent the seconds.♥ Analog clockFrom settings you can:♥ Set a custom text on your watch face♥ Choose Black or Light theme♥ Choose to show or hide the tail of the arrows (for hour and minutes)♥ Choose to animate the heart ring (so you know the seconds) or to be static (no animation and no seconds)
descriptionHTML:
This watch face is for Android Wear smart watches.
♥ Custom text
♥ Date (day + month)
♥ The fill heart from the heart ring represent the seconds.
♥ Analog clock

From settings you can:
♥ Set a custom text on your watch face
♥ Choose Black or Light theme
♥ Choose to show or hide the tail of the arrows (for hour and minutes)
♥ Choose to animate the heart ring (so you know the seconds) or to be static (no animation and no seconds)
comments: Not very readable Nice idea but difficult to read time in it. Plus, I can't find the settings anywhere.
